document.docAuthor: Garrevoet, T., Garrevoet, W. & Özbek, H.
document.masterDocTitle: Data on the Geographic Distribution of Sesiidae (Lepidoptera) in Turkey

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Data on the Geographic Distribution of Sesiidae (Lepidoptera) in Turkey

subSubSection.paragraph: D i s t r i b u t i o n: south-eastern and central Europe, Belarus , southern en central European part of Russia , Ukraine , Transcaucasia, Turkey , northern Iran , northern Syria , Lebanon .
R e m a r k s: widespread and common where Rumex sp. grows. It occurs even at high altitudes (up to 2800 m ).
